predicate.note: Frames file for 'regain' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry obtain-13.5.2, other framed members include seize or more generally buy, catch, fetch, hire, lease, pick, reserve, save, vote. No Framenet entry. Comparison with get_back.

roleset.name: get back

example.name: usually without arg2
example.text: But Western Union has said it must lower the interest rate on its debt *trace* to regain full financial health.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: Mary regained possession of the TV remote from John.

roleset.note: Actually, that sounds a little bizarre.
